sn42.1:1.2: Atha kho cando gamani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho cando gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.1:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacco cando candotveva sankham gacchati.
sn42.1:1.4: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva sankham gacchati”ti?
sn42.1:1.6: Ragassa appahinatta pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamano kopam patukaroti.
sn42.1:1.9: Dosassa appahinatta pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamano kopam patukaroti.
sn42.1:1.12: Mohassa appahinatta pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamano kopam patukaroti.
sn42.1:1.14: Ayam kho, gamani, hetu, ayam paccayo yena midhekacco cando candotveva sankham gacchati.
sn42.1:2.1: Idha pana, gamani, ekaccassa rago pahino hoti.
sn42.1:2.2: Ragassa pahinatta pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamano kopam na patukaroti.
sn42.1:2.5: Dosassa pahinatta pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamano kopam na patukaroti.
sn42.1:2.8: Mohassa pahinatta pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamano kopam na patukaroti.
sn42.1:2.10: Ayam kho, gamani, hetu ayam paccayo yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva sankham gacchati”ti.
sn42.1:3.1: Evam vutte, cando gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.1:3.3: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
sn42.1:3.4: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn42.1:3.5: Upasakam mam bhagava dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
